Text.Page:
The Eldritch Academy is in a panic! We wanted to have a simple harvest festival, but we've been getting threatening letters. "You will be haunted by your past misdeeds." Stuff like that.

Serena asked me to figure out who's trying to ruin our good time, probably because she caught me reading "Thrilling Detective Tales" when I should have been studying.

I'm chasing after the mastermind. While I do that, can you keep our party safe?"Sure...but safe from what?"

Tuwangis, mostly. They're massing at the academy as we speak. But don't worry. We can turn their superstitions against them.

Use the cannon to chuck pumpkins at the uninvited guests and defend our party supplies—especially the candy.

When the tuwangis get hit with pumpkins—symbols of the harvest itself—they'll flee like the cowards they are.

You didn't run out of pumpkins, did you? Good.
Here, take this...and feel free to join the party. It'll be perfect!"What about the huge pumpkin monster?"
Pumpkin monster? Must be a clever costume. Certainly nothing to worry about. You <PCCLASS:lcase>s can be such worrywarts.
